d: A FreeSewing pattern for a basic skirt block pattern based on Aldrich

cutFrontOnFold.d: Disable to add seam at center front.

cutFrontOnFoldNo.d: Allows a zipper to be added at center front.

cutBackOnFold.d: Disable to add seam at center back.

cutBackOnFoldNo.d: Allows a zipper to be added at center back.

waistDrop.d: Waistline drop from waist toward hips

extraSeatEase.d: Ease added to seat measurement to account for fabric stretch and closure style.

waistRise.d: Rise of waistline between front/back center and sides

sideSeamCurveOffset.d: Offset from line between side seat and front/back side top to shape hip/seat curve

backOutsideDartLength.d: Length of the outside darts on the back

backInsideDartLength.d: Length of inside darts on back
